channel.title: Upgrading from 9.6
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm a longtime Whonix user (and bitcoin donater, so don't make fun of my questions! :)). I am aware that Whonix is now up to version 10.0.0.5 (or something like that), but I seem to be stuck on build 9.6 (although it could be 9.7; it's definitely one of those two). I'm using Whonix stable, so it's quite possible that this is completely normal seeing as how 10.0.0.5 seems to be a beta of sorts, but I just want to make triple-sure that I won't find my IP address and personal info scattered across the internets because I'm using an outdated build.
Thanks for your help!
Lloyd Christmas

item.title: Upgrading from 9.6
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You’re most likely only confused by this one… Please see:

Whonix

Whonixcheck

Whonix Security Check Application. Sanity Test. Leak Test. Update Check.

A link to that will be contained in next version.

Read full topic
